Values.AOAI_APIM_EVENTHUB_CONNECTION: Endpoint=sb://<event hub namespace>.servicebus.chinacloudapi.cn/;SharedAccessKeyName=<access key name>;SharedAccessKey=<access key>;EntityPath=<event hub name>
Values.AOAI_DB_STORE_CONNECTION: Driver={ODBC Driver 18 for SQL Server};Server=tcp:<sqldbsrv name>.database.chinacloudapi.cn,1433;Database=<db name>;Uid=<user>;Pwd=<password>;Encrypt=yes;TrustServerCertificate=no;Connection Timeout=30;
